title: Manuever
description: Focus on tight turns and low-speed combat to get on the enemy's tail. Best for lighter fighters.

title: Boom-and-Zoom
description: Use height and speed to dive, attack, and climb away quickly. Best for medium-large fighters.

title: Energy Fighting
description: Climb up to higher altitude and try to get the height advantage. Best for large fighters.

title: Stealth Ambush
description: Utilize reduced radar cross-section to approach undetected and strike first. Best for advanced stealth fighters.

title: Beyond Visual Range
description: Engage enemies with long-range missiles before entering visual combat. Best for interceptors.

title: Swarm Tactics
description: Overwhelm superior aircraft with sheer numbers and coordinated low-tech attacks. Best for mass-produced light fighters.

title: Head-On Assault
description: Strike with a frontal attack pass, risking collision for a high-damage kill. Best for heavily armed fighters.

title: Electronic Warfare
description: Jam enemy radar and disable missile locks to force a close-range gunfight. Best for support aircraft.

title: Defensive Turtle
description: Maximize armor and fly defensively to waste the enemy's ammunition before counter-attacking. Best for heavy strike aircraft.

title: Drag and Bag
description: One pilot flies defensively as bait to lure an enemy into a teammate's firing line. Best for wingman pairs.
